mapper.insert: insert into wishlist(user_id, product_id) values((select user_id from user where email = #{email}), #{productId})
mapper.select: select w.wishlist_id as wishlistId, p.product_id as productId, p.name, b.name as brandName, p.image_url as imageUrl, p.original_price as originalPrice, p.current_price as currentPrice from wishlist w join product p on w.product_id = p.product_id join user u on w.user_id = u.user_id join brand b on b.brand_id = p.brand_id where u.email = #{email}
select count(*) from wishlist where user_id = (select user_id from user where email = #{email}) and product_id = #{productId}
